name: Bridge Builder
description:
Bridge Builder is a hard platformer about pushing blocks to make paths to complete the level. this game only has 3 levels, as i no longer work on it. this was my first game

////IMPORTANT\\\\

GLITCHES AND GETTING STUCK IN BLOCKS

WASD to walk jump and stuff

Hit Double twice to double jump.

R TO RESTART IF YOUR BRIDGE DOESNT TURN OUT

IJKL for second player.

F to go through doors
